Text:
This one is deep on meaning and short on either sex or eroticism. As girl draws female figures on an artist's pad, she begins to daydream and masterbate. Finishes in exactly 2 minutes; just like real life! She goes back to the drawing, daydreams, and one of the figures comes to life briefly. A few caresses and she is gone.
Since the video is half the length of most of the others, makes you wonder if there is a second part or follow-on, Girlish Dreams 2?
Not worth a D/L unless you just want one more Galitsin video with a young girl.
